faq.title: Resume writing FAQs
faq.subtitle: Questions we hear before clients start.

items.question: Is this resume writing or coaching?
items.answer: It’s both — we align the resume to your target role and comp, then write for signal and impact.

items.question: Do you work with senior ICs and managers?
items.answer: Yes. The resume is built to signal seniority and leadership scope.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: Most resume rebuilds are delivered in 7–10 days, depending on complexity.

items.question: Will this help with ATS?
items.answer: Yes. We use clean formatting and keyword alignment without sacrificing readability.

items.question: Do you rewrite LinkedIn too?
items.answer: LinkedIn is available as a separate service or part of brand packages.

items.question: Can you work with my current resume?
items.answer: Yes. We use your existing resume and elevate it to your target level.

items.question: Do you guarantee interviews?
items.answer: No guarantees, but we build the strongest possible signal for your target roles.

items.question: What if I don’t know my target role?
items.answer: We’ll clarify role targeting before writing the resume.

cta.title: Ready for a resume that signals seniority?
cta.body: Book a call and we’ll map the fastest path.
cta.label: Book a Call

items.question: When should I start negotiation prep?
items.answer: Ideally before you receive an offer so you can align expectations early.

items.answer: Yes. We consider total comp including equity, bonuses, and sign‑on.

items.answer: No. We provide strategy and scripts so you can negotiate confidently.

items.question: Can you review multiple offers?
items.answer: Yes. We can help compare and decide.

items.question: What if I’m nervous about negotiating?
items.answer: That’s common. We give you a clear plan and language to use.

items.question: Do you guarantee more pay?
items.answer: No guarantees, but we improve your leverage and execution.

items.question: Can this be bundled with interview prep?
items.answer: Yes. Many clients combine both as they approach offers.

atsAudit.h1: ATS Audit for Resume Signal Gaps
atsAudit.subtitle: Find the exact blockers in your resume and fix them fast.
atsAudit.supporting: We identify ATS issues and signal gaps that stall interviews.

heroModules.title: ATS scan
heroModules.body: Check parsing, structure, and keyword alignment.

heroModules.title: Signal gaps

heroModules.title: Fix roadmap

items.title: ATS clarity
items.body: Structure and keywords that parse correctly.

items.title: Level cues
items.body: Spot missing scope and impact indicators.

items.title: Action plan
items.body: A prioritized roadmap of changes.

items.title: Formatting errors
items.body: Tables, columns, or headers that break parsing.

items.title: Keyword drift
items.body: Missing role-family language recruiters filter for.

items.title: Weak scope
items.body: Impact and level aren’t obvious to humans.
